Submodules¶

pgan_dl.pipelines.model_training.nodes module¶

pgan_dl.pipelines.model_training.nodes.create_data_loader(input_dir, batch_size, num_workers)[source]¶

Creates pytorch data loader from places365 dataset :type input_dir: str :param input_dir: Path to the root of the dataset :type input_dir: str :type batch_size: int :param batch_size: Number of images in a batch :type batch_size: int :type num_workers: int :param num_workers: How many subprocesses are used for data loading :type num_workers: int :return: Data loader for the dataset :rtype: torch.utils.data.DataLoader

pgan_dl.pipelines.model_training.nodes.initialize(input_dir, latent_size, final_res, negative_slope, alpha_step, batch_size, lr, num_workers)[source]¶

Initializes neural network for solving classification problem on Places365 dataset :type input_dir: str :param input_dir: Path to the split dataset. :type input_dir: str :type latent_size: int :param latent_size: A latent size of a model. :type latent_size: int :type final_res: int :param final_res: A resolution of the generated image. :type final_res: int :type negative_slope: float :param negative_slope: A hyperparam of the LeakyReLU activation function. :type negative_slope: float :type alpha_step: float :param alpha_step: A alpha_step of the model :type alpha_step: float :type batch_size: int :param batch_size: Number of images in a batch. :type batch_size: int :type lr: float :param lr: Learning rate for model’s optimizer. :type lr: float :type num_workers: int :param num_workers: How many subprocesses are used for data loading. :type num_workers: int :return: Model object alongside train, validation, test data loaders :rtype: Tuple[PGAN, torch.utils.data.DataLoader]

pgan_dl.pipelines.model_training.nodes.train_model(model, dataloader, max_epochs, checkpoint_path, loger_entity, loger_name)[source]¶

Trains the model :type model: PGAN :param model: Model object created with initialize() :type model: PlacesModel :type dataloader: DataLoader :param dataloader: Pytorch dataloader which handles training data :type dataloader: torch.utils.data.DataLoader :type max_epochs: int :param max_epochs: Max number of epochs :type max_epochs: number :type checkpoint_path: str :param checkpoint_path: Path to directory in which to save model checkpoints :type checkpoint_path: str :type loger_entity: str :param loger_entity: WandDB entity name :type loger_entity: str :type loger_name: str :param loger_name: WandDB loger name :type loger_name: str

Returns

A trained model alongside dataloader

Return type

Tuple[PGAN, torch.utils.data.DataLoader]
